TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PropertyChangedCallback(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyChangedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The on which the property has changed value.
Event data that is issued by any event that tracks changes to the effective value of this property.
Docs.summary: Represents the callback that is invoked when the effective property value of a dependency property changes.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example registers a new dependency property, using the signature that specifies a PropertyChangedCallback. The PropertyChangedCallback is used to create a callback that changes an internal property whenever the public property changes.
[!code-cs[WPFAquariumSln#RegisterAG](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/WPFAquariumSln/WPFAquariumObjects/Class1.cs#registerag)] [!code-vb[WPFAquariumSln#RegisterAG](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wpfaquariumobjects/class1.vb#registerag)]
[!code-cs[WPFAquariumSln#AGPropertyChangedCallback](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/WPFAquariumSln/WPFAquariumObjects/Class1.cs#agpropertychangedcallback)] [!code-vb[WPFAquariumSln#AGPropertyChangedCallback](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/wpfaquariumobjects/class1.vb#agpropertychangedcallback)]
